name: interdealer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used for describing arrangements and agreements between brokers (= organizations whose business is buying and selling financial products): The mass resignations have attracted plenty of attention within the notoriously combative interdealer market. Deals done in the inter-dealer broking business often take just seconds to complete.
More examplesFewer examplesThe inter-dealer broking market witnessed a number of high- profile court cases relating to unfair dismissal. The firm is one of Luxembourg’s leading inter-dealer brokerage firms servicing banks, hedge funds, and investors across the globe.If the only contemporaneous interdealer trade was between two market makers, it may be used as the basis for determining the prevailing market price.
